uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.headless

Interface HeadlessMediaPlayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MediaPlayer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHeadlessMediaPlayer

    public interface HeadlessMediaPlayer
extends MediaPlayer
    Specification for a media player component that is not intended to display the media.

    This is useful, for example, when a media player component is being used to stream media.

    Note that client applications must still set proper media options otherwise a native video window may still appear, for example the following media options could be used when creating the MediaPlayerFactory. 

     String[] args = {"--vout", "dummy"};
